name: web3-message-signer-verifier
description: Full-stack Web3 app for signing and verifying messages using Dynamic.xyz

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=frontend & npm run dev --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=frontend && npm run typecheck --workspace=backend
